Ubah dan hapus data catatan Mengubah jurusan berarti merubah semua data yang sudah terlibat di dalamnya, contoh: ketika siswa mempunyai kelas dan jurusan, maka ketika jurusan di rubah data yang terdapat di siswa juga akan berubah catatan untuk menghapus data tidak di bolehkan kecuali data tersebut belum di gunakan oleh data lain contoh : ketika siswa mempunyai jurusan maka jurusan tidak akan bisa di hapus kecuali siswa sudah di hapus terlebih dahulu

docs.text: Alur Prakerin
docs.title: Alur Prakerin

docs.text: Membuat jadwal Prakerin contoh pengisian form Status pendaftaran Status pendaftaran akan terbuka dan siswa boleh mendaftar prakerin ketika tgl. sekarang belum memasuki jadwal prakerin, dan akan otomatis tertutup otomatis
docs.title: Membuat jadwal Prakerin

docs.text: contoh pengisian form Status pendaftaran Status pendaftaran akan terbuka dan siswa boleh mendaftar prakerin ketika tgl. sekarang belum memasuki jadwal prakerin, dan akan otomatis tertutup otomatis
docs.title: Membuat jadwal Prakerin

docs.text: Input Pembimbing Industri Studi Kasus Sebagai siswa yang memulai prakerin pada hari pertama, yang pasti ada namnaya pengenalan, baik itu tempat kerja dan pembimbing dari industi Maka hal pertama yang wajib di lakukan oleh siswa peserta industri sendiri adalah untuk mendaftarkan pembimbing mereka ke data prakerin Alur Pengerjaan siswa wajib sudah berstatus sedang prakerin Di dashboard akan muncul peringatan untuk menginputan data pembimbing Pilih data yang sudah ada / tambah data baru jika belum ada data pembimbing tersedia isi form sesuai dengan data yang di minta pilih pembimbing yang terdaftar / yang tadi dibuat Klik submit pembimbing industri Maka akan muncl data pembimbing yang di inputkan di dashboard
docs.title: Input Pembimbing Industri

docs.text: Sebagai siswa yang memulai prakerin pada hari pertama, yang pasti ada namnaya pengenalan, baik itu tempat kerja dan pembimbing dari industi Maka hal pertama yang wajib di lakukan oleh siswa peserta industri sendiri adalah untuk mendaftarkan pembimbing mereka ke data prakerin
docs.title: Studi Kasus

docs.text: siswa wajib sudah berstatus sedang prakerin Di dashboard akan muncul peringatan untuk menginputan data pembimbing Pilih data yang sudah ada / tambah data baru jika belum ada data pembimbing tersedia isi form sesuai dengan data yang di minta pilih pembimbing yang terdaftar / yang tadi dibuat Klik submit pembimbing industri Maka akan muncl data pembimbing yang di inputkan di dashboard
docs.title: Alur Pengerjaan

docs.text: Absensi Harian Studi Kasus Sebagai siswa yang sedang prakerin absensi kehadiran merupakan hal yang wajib dilakukan, dan juka agar pihak dari sekolah juga mengetahui aktivtas prakerin Alur Siswa siswa wajib sudah berstatus sedang prakerin Di dashboard akan ada widget absensi prakerin, klik tambah absensi untuk menambah Silahkan isi form sesuai dengan benar Maka akan muncul pada kalendar absensi yang tadi di buat Tunggu guru mengkonfirmasi absensi harian Status absensi Absensi sakit, ijin keluar / tidak berangkat untuk absensi selain keberangkatan silahkan kontak guru bersangkutan untuk menginputkan absensi terkait Alur Guru disini guru dituntut untuk melakukan konfirmasi absensi keberangkatan dan menginput ketidak hadiran siswa Mengkonfirmasi abesnsi Masuk halaman admin Menu absensi harian Pilih absesni dan lakukan aksi konfirmasi absen Menginputkan ijin siswa Masuk halaman absensi dan klik tombol tambah absesnsi (lihat gambar) Masukan informasi absesni dengan benar dan klik submit
docs.title: Absensi Harian

docs.text: Sebagai siswa yang sedang prakerin absensi kehadiran merupakan hal yang wajib dilakukan, dan juka agar pihak dari sekolah juga mengetahui aktivtas prakerin
docs.title: Studi Kasus

docs.text: siswa wajib sudah berstatus sedang prakerin Di dashboard akan ada widget absensi prakerin, klik tambah absensi untuk menambah Silahkan isi form sesuai dengan benar Maka akan muncul pada kalendar absensi yang tadi di buat Tunggu guru mengkonfirmasi absensi harian Status absensi Absensi sakit, ijin keluar / tidak berangkat untuk absensi selain keberangkatan silahkan kontak guru bersangkutan untuk menginputkan absensi terkait
docs.title: Alur Siswa

docs.title: Mengkonfirmasi abesnsi

docs.text: Jurnal Harian Studi Kasus Sebagai siswa yang sedang prakerin jurnal kegiatan harian merupakan hal yang wajib dilakukan, dan juka agar pihak dari sekolah juga mengetahui aktivtas prakerin Alur Siswa siswa wajib sudah berstatus sedang prakerin Di dashboard akan ada widget jurnal prakerin, klik tambah jurnal untuk menambah Silahkan isi form sesuai dengan benar Maka akan muncul pada kalendar jurnal yang tadi di buat Tunggu guru mengkonfirmasi jurnal yang di submit Status konfirmasi jika belum di konfirmasi maka tidak akan masuk dokument print out Alur Guru disini guru dituntut untuk melakukan konfirmasi jurnal kegiatan Mengkonfirmasi abesnsi Masuk halaman admin Menu jurnal Pilih absesni dan lakukan aksi konfirmasi absen
docs.title: Jurnal Harian

docs.text: Sebagai siswa yang sedang prakerin jurnal kegiatan harian merupakan hal yang wajib dilakukan, dan juka agar pihak dari sekolah juga mengetahui aktivtas prakerin
docs.title: Studi Kasus

docs.text: siswa wajib sudah berstatus sedang prakerin Di dashboard akan ada widget jurnal prakerin, klik tambah jurnal untuk menambah Silahkan isi form sesuai dengan benar Maka akan muncul pada kalendar jurnal yang tadi di buat Tunggu guru mengkonfirmasi jurnal yang di submit Status konfirmasi jika belum di konfirmasi maka tidak akan masuk dokument print out

docs.text: disini guru dituntut untuk melakukan konfirmasi jurnal kegiatan

docs.text: Supervisi Perisiapan akun supervisi untuk melakukan kegiatan supervisi pastikan akun guru mempunyai akses berupa supervisi siswa prakerin, untuk supervisi semua data prakerin Supervisi Kelas, untuk supervisi berdasarkan kelas Supervisi Area, untuk supervisi berdasarkan area Form Guru Pengisian Data Supervisi Alur Guru Menginput data supervisi Masuk halaman admin Menu supervisi => Supervisi Siswa Prakerin Isi form dengan sesuai Jika sudah maka informasi lengkap, dan riwayat supervisi berada di halaman detail supervisi Alur siswa Ketika siswa login maka akan muncul pemberitahuan bahwa ada data supervisi di inputkan Siswa bisa memasukan pesan untuk guru, dan klik konfirmasi supervisi Lihat daftar kode industri dan admin supervisi Lihat rekap supervisi berdsarkan kode industri dan bulan Download Laporan Excel Supervisi disini kamu bisa mendownload hasil rekap excel supervisi Print Supervisi Per siswa prakerin disini kamu juga bisa mendownload laporan supervisi per siswa
docs.title: Supervisi

docs.text: untuk melakukan kegiatan supervisi pastikan akun guru mempunyai akses berupa supervisi siswa prakerin, untuk supervisi semua data prakerin Supervisi Kelas, untuk supervisi berdasarkan kelas Supervisi Area, untuk supervisi berdasarkan area
docs.title: Perisiapan akun supervisi

docs.text: Masuk halaman admin Menu supervisi => Supervisi Siswa Prakerin Isi form dengan sesuai Jika sudah maka informasi lengkap, dan riwayat supervisi berada di halaman detail supervisi
docs.title: Menginput data supervisi

docs.text: Ketika siswa login maka akan muncul pemberitahuan bahwa ada data supervisi di inputkan Siswa bisa memasukan pesan untuk guru, dan klik konfirmasi supervisi
docs.title: Alur siswa
Lihat daftar kode industri dan admin supervisi
Lihat rekap supervisi berdsarkan kode industri dan bulan

docs.text: disini kamu bisa mendownload hasil rekap excel supervisi
docs.title: Download Laporan Excel Supervisi

docs.text: disini kamu juga bisa mendownload laporan supervisi per siswa
docs.title: Print Supervisi Per siswa prakerin

docs.text: Sertifikat Prakerin Perisiapan akun penilaian untuk melakukan kegiatan penilaian pastikan akun guru mempunyai akses berupa penilaian siswa prakerin, untuk penilaian semua data prakerin penilaian Kelas, untuk penilaian berdasarkan kelas Form guru Pengisian Data Sertifikat Alur Guru Menginput data Cara Manual / Satu Siswa Masuk halaman admin Menu penilaian Pilih Siswa yang akan di inputkan nilai Masukan pengisian data dan simpan Import dari data excel Pada halaman penilaian, pilih filter jadwal dan kelas Masukan data penilaian pada setiap kolom yang di sediakan Masukan berkas yang sudah di edit pada form upload data dan klik upload sampai mendapatkan notifikasi sukses Pengisian tanggal otomatis ketika print sertifikat Ketika print data sertifikat prakerin, bisa klik tombol agar pengisian tanggal otomatis terisi
docs.title: Sertifikat Prakerin

docs.text: untuk melakukan kegiatan penilaian pastikan akun guru mempunyai akses berupa penilaian siswa prakerin, untuk penilaian semua data prakerin penilaian Kelas, untuk penilaian berdasarkan kelas
docs.title: Perisiapan akun penilaian

docs.text: Masuk halaman admin Menu penilaian Pilih Siswa yang akan di inputkan nilai Masukan pengisian data dan simpan
docs.title: Cara Manual / Satu Siswa

docs.text: Pada halaman penilaian, pilih filter jadwal dan kelas Masukan data penilaian pada setiap kolom yang di sediakan Masukan berkas yang sudah di edit pada form upload data dan klik upload sampai mendapatkan notifikasi sukses
docs.title: Import dari data excel

docs.text: Ketika print data sertifikat prakerin, bisa klik tombol agar pengisian tanggal otomatis terisi
docs.title: Pengisian tanggal otomatis ketika print sertifikat

docs.text: Implementasi prakerin tahap 1 SMK Ma'arif NU 1 Ajibarang Persiapan jadwal lakukan pengaturan agar jadwal tetap terbuka dengan cara centang paksa buka pendaftaran prakerin, dengan ini siswa bisa tetap mendaftarkan jadwal walau waktu sudah melebihi dari tanggal ijinkan siswa untuk mengatur tanggal prakerin di waktu mendaftar agar mulai dan selesai prakerin bisa langsung di setel waktu mendaftarkan diri jadikan status pendaftaran agar langsung di terima dan langsung berstatus prakerin Upload data siswa Silahkan upload data siswa terlebih dahulu Klik tutorial Lakukan pendaftaran prakerin oleh siswa lakukan pendaftaran prakerin oleh siswa, / guru secara manual Lakukan import data penilaian sertifikat Langkah teakhir adalah import data penilaian sertifikat oleh guru terkait Klik tutorial
docs.title: Implementasi prakerin tahap 1 SMK Ma'arif NU 1 Ajibarang
Implementasi prakerin tahap 1 SMK Ma'arif NU 1 Ajibarang

docs.text: lakukan pengaturan agar jadwal tetap terbuka dengan cara centang paksa buka pendaftaran prakerin, dengan ini siswa bisa tetap mendaftarkan jadwal walau waktu sudah melebihi dari tanggal ijinkan siswa untuk mengatur tanggal prakerin di waktu mendaftar agar mulai dan selesai prakerin bisa langsung di setel waktu mendaftarkan diri jadikan status pendaftaran agar langsung di terima dan langsung berstatus prakerin
docs.title: Persiapan jadwal

docs.text: Silahkan upload data siswa terlebih dahulu Klik tutorial
docs.title: Upload data siswa

docs.text: lakukan pendaftaran prakerin oleh siswa, / guru secara manual
docs.title: Lakukan pendaftaran prakerin oleh siswa

docs.text: Langkah teakhir adalah import data penilaian sertifikat oleh guru terkait Klik tutorial
docs.title: Lakukan import data penilaian sertifikat

docs.text: Short Notice: Let's prakerin application is made with high privacy standards. We will not store any information data from your google account. However, we use your account to backup files uploaded during the internship transaction as follows: confirmation file from industry student journal files student report files Personal secret Last updated: January 13, 2022 This Privacy Policy describes our policies and procedures regarding the collection, use and disclosure of your information when you use the Service and informs you of your privacy rights and how the law protects you. We use your gdrivei storage to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, you consent to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy. Interpretation and Definition Interpretation Words whose initial letters are capitalized have the meanings specified under the following conditions. The following definitions must have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in the singular or plural. Definition For the purposes of this Privacy Policy: You means the individual accessing or using the Service, or a company, or other legal entity on behalf of the individual accessing or using the Service, as applicable. Under the GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation), you may be referred to as a Data Subject or as a User because you are the individual using the Service. Company (referred to as the “Company”, “We”, “We” or “We” in this Agreement) refers to Hantamkoding, jl. Kasegeran, kasegeran, cilongok, banyumas, central java indonesia 53162. For GDPR purposes, the Company is the Data Controller. Application means a software program provided by the Company which is downloaded by you on any electronic device, named Ayo Prakerin Website refers to our web pages such as Ayo Prakerin which can be accessed from application-prakerin.gitlab.io Service refers to the Application and Website and other digital properties provided by the Company. Account means a unique account created for you to access our Services or any part of our Services. Service Provider means any person or legal entity that processes data on behalf of the Company. It refers to a third party company or individual employed by the Company to facilitate the Service, to provide the Service on behalf of the Company, to perform services related to the Service or to assist the Company in analyzing how the Service is used. For GDPR purposes, Service Providers are considered Data Processors. Third Party Social Media Services refers to any website or social networking website through which the User can log in or create an account to use the Service. Facebook Fan Page is a public profile named Ayo Prakerin for Gmail specially created by the Company on the Facebook social network, accessible from https://www.facebook.com/Come PrakerinforGmail Personal Data is any information relating to an identified or identifiable individual. For GDPR purposes, Personal Data means any information relating to you such as your name, identification number, location data, online identifier, or one or more factors specific to physical, physiological, genetic, mental, economic, cultural or social factors. identity. Device means any device that can access the Service such as a computer, mobile phone or digital tablet. Usage Data refers to data that is automatically collected, either generated by the use of the Service or from the infrastructure of the Service itself (for example, the duration of page visits). Data Controller , for purposes of the GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation), refers to the Company as a legal entity which alone or together with other parties determines the purposes and means of processing Personal Data. Collecting and Using Your Personal Data Types of Data Collected We don't collect any data in your google account, why??. because we will only use your google drive account to sync files from our service with agencies or companies as consumers of our users Cookies and Similar Tracking Technology Data We do not use cookies, other than to store identical login access in our application, However you can instruct your browser to refuse all Cookies or to indicate when Cookies are being sent. However, if you do not accept Cookies, you may not be able to use some parts of our Service. Use of Your Personal Data We do not use your personal information data but companies may use the files synced with our service for the following purposes: Sharing files tied to the application , almost all files tied to the let's prakerin application service will be shared and can be seen by all application users, from teachers, students and related industry institutions Retention of Your Personal Data The Company will retain your Personal Data only for as long as necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. We will retain and use your Personal Data to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations (for example, if we are required to retain your data to comply with applicable law), resolve disputes, and enforce our legal agreements and policies. The Company will also retain Usage Data for internal analysis purposes. Usage Data is generally stored for a shorter period of time, unless this data is used to strengthen security or to improve the functionality of Our Services, or We are legally obligated to retain this data for a longer period of time. Disclosure of your Personal Data Business transaction If the Company is involved in a merger, acquisition or asset sale, your Personal Data may be transferred. We will provide notice before your Personal Data is transferred and is subject to a different Privacy Policy. Law enforcement In certain circumstances, the Company may be required to disclose your Personal Data if required by law or in response to a legitimate request by a public authority (eg courts or government agencies). Other legal requirements The Company may disclose your Personal Data in good faith and belief that such action is necessary to: Comply with legal obligations Protect and defend the rights or property of the Company Prevent or investigate possible errors in connection with the Service Protect the personal safety of Service Users or the public Protect from legal liability Security of Your Personal Data The security of your Personal Data is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. Although we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security. Detailed Information about the Processing of your Personal Data Service Providers have access to your Personal Data only to perform their duties on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose. Analysis We may use third party Service providers to monitor and analyze the use of our Service. Google Analytics Google Analytics is a web analytics service offered by Google that tracks and reports website traffic. Google uses the collected data to track and monitor the use of our Services. This data is shared with other Google services. Google may use the data it collects to contextualize and personalize ads from its own advertising network. You can opt out of certain Google Analytics features through your mobile device settings, such as your device's advertising settings or by following the instructions provided by Google in their Privacy Policy: [https://policies.google.com/privacy?hl=en ] (https://policies.google.com/privacy?hl=en) For more information about Google's privacy practices, visit the Google Privacy Terms webpage: [https://policies.google.com/privacy?hl=en] ( https://policies.google.com/privacy?hl=en) Visual Studio Application Center The Visual Studio Application Center tracks (anonymously) how many users are using a particular version of our Application. This helps us to place the number of crash reports in relation to the usage of a particular version. In addition, we use the Visual Studio Application Center to anonymously track usage of our application and its features. Visual Studio Application Center does not collect any Personal Identifiable Information (PII). Their servers are located in the United States and operate under the Microsoft Azure Service Agreement . The Visual Studio Application Center is owned by Microsoft and the applicable data protection requirements can be reviewed at https://privacy.microsoft.com/en-us/PrivacyStatement . Advertisement We may use Service providers to display advertisements to you to help support and maintain Our Services. Pepo Campaign Pepo Campaigns is an email address management and marketing services platform built on top of AWS Simple Email Service and provided by Pepo, Inc. Information collected by Pepo Campaigns is stored in accordance with its Privacy Policy: https://know. pepocampaigns.com/articles/privacy-policy/ Usage, Performance and More We may use third party Service Providers to provide better improvements to our Services. Invisible reCAPTCHA Google Invisible reCAPTCHA is a service that prevents spam on contact forms. It is operated by Google. Google Invisible's reCAPTCHA service may collect information from you and from your Device for security purposes. Information collected by Google Invisible reCAPTCHA is stored in accordance with Google's Privacy Policy: https://www.google.com/intl/en/policies/privacy/ Data protection requirements about Our Application Let's Prakerin and the use of Google user data Accounts are added to our Ayo Prakeirn app using OAuth authentication. OAuth is a secure mechanism that gives Ayo Prakerin access to your Google account data without sharing your password. This token is valid as long as you use Ayo Prakerin and is stored locally on your PC. If you re-install Jobs, you will be asked to re-authorize Jobs for each Google Account using OAuth. Here, the following applies in particular: Applications will only use access to read, write, modify, or control files in folders that are authorized by the user. The app will not use this Google data to serve ads. Application will not allow humans to read this data. For some features of the Ayo Prakerin application, you will need to transfer a very limited set of Google user data to our servers. The following paragraphs explain which data will be used and why: To Save Data Files on Google Drive, you must create a new folder and write down the folder id in the Let's Prakerin application subscribe. This is because we only need to know where to put the files attached to the application to place them. GDPR Privacy Legal Basis for Processing Personal Data under GDPR If you are from the European Economic Area (EEA) or the United Kingdom, our legal basis for collecting and using the personal information described in this Privacy Policy depends on the Personal Data we collect and the specific context in which we collect it. We or our Service Providers may process Personal Data under the following conditions: Consent: You have given your consent to processing Personal Data for one or more specific purposes. Contract performance: Provision of Personal Data is necessary for the performance of the agreement with you and/or for any pre-contractual obligations thereof. Legal obligations: Processing of Personal Data is required to comply with legal obligations subject to the Company. Vital interests: The processing of Personal Data is necessary to protect the vital interests of you or others. Public interest: Processing of Personal Data in connection with tasks performed in the public interest or in the exercise of official authority granted to the Company. Legal interest: Processing of Personal Data is necessary for the purposes of the legitimate interests pursued by the Company. However, the Company will be happy to help clarify the specific legal basis applicable to the processing, and in particular whether the provision of Personal Data is a statutory or contractual requirement, or a necessary condition for entering into a contract. Your rights under GDPR The Company promises to respect the confidentiality of your Personal Data and guarantees that you can exercise your rights. You have the right under this Privacy Policy, and by law if you are in the EU, to: Request access to your Personal Data. The right to access, update or delete the information we hold about you. Whenever possible, you can access, update or request deletion of your Personal Data directly in the settings section of your account. If you are unable to perform this action yourself, please contact us to assist you. It also allows you to receive a copy of the Personal Data We hold about you. Request correction of the Personal Data We hold about you. You have the right to correct any incomplete or inaccurate information We hold about you. Objection to the processing of your Personal Data. This right exists when We rely on a legitimate interest as a legal basis for Our processing and there is something about Your particular situation, which makes you want to object to our processing of Your Personal Data. Your Personal Data on this basis. You also have the right to object when We process your Personal Data for direct marketing purposes. Request deletion of your Personal Data. You have the right to ask us to delete or delete your Personal Data if there is no good reason for us to continue processing it. Request the transfer of your Personal Data. We will provide to you, or to a third party you have selected, your Personal Data in a structured, commonly used and machine-readable format. Please note that this right only applies to automated information that you initially consent to us using or where we use that information to enter into a contract with you. Revoke your consent. You have the right to withdraw your consent to the use of your Personal Data. If you withdraw your consent, we may not be able to provide you with access to certain special functions of the Service. Exercise Your GDPR Data Protection Rights You can exercise your right to access, correct, cancel and challenge by contacting us. Please note that we may ask you to verify your identity before responding to such requests. If you make a request, we will try our best to respond to you as soon as possible. You have the right to complain to the Data Protection Authority about our collection and use of your Personal Data. For more information, if you are located in the European Economic Area (EEA) or the United Kingdom, contact your local data protection authority in the EEA or the United Kingdom. Kids Privacy Our services are not directed at anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 13. If you are a parent or guardian and you know that your child has provided personal data to us, please contact us. If we become aware that we have collected Personal Data from anyone under the age of 13 without verification of parental consent, we take steps to remove that information from our servers. If we need to rely on consent as a legal basis for processing your information and your country requires parental consent, we may need your parental consent before we collect and use the information. Websites and Other Services Our Services may contain links to other websites that are not operated by us. If you click on a third party link, you will be directed to that third party site. We strongly encourage you to review the Privacy Policy of each site you visit. We have no control over and are not responsible for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services. How "Do Not Track" requests are handled Our service does not support "Do Not Track" requests. To determine whether any of the third-party services it uses fulfills a "Do Not Track" request, please read their privacy policy. Changes to this Privacy Policy We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the “Last updated” date at the top of this Privacy Policy. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when posted on this page. Contact us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, you can contact us: By e-mail: hantamkoding@gmail.com By mail: Mohamad Supangat, Hantamkoding Jl. Kasegeran, Cilongok, Banyumas, Central Java 53162 Indonesia To comply with our obligations under EU data protection laws, we have appointed a Data Protection Officer (DPO) who can be contacted using the details given above.
docs.title: Privacy Policy

docs.text: Last updated: January 13, 2022 This Privacy Policy describes our policies and procedures regarding the collection, use and disclosure of your information when you use the Service and informs you of your privacy rights and how the law protects you. We use your gdrivei storage to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, you consent to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.
docs.title: Personal secret

docs.text: Words whose initial letters are capitalized have the meanings specified under the following conditions. The following definitions must have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in the singular or plural.
docs.title: Interpretation

docs.text: For the purposes of this Privacy Policy: You means the individual accessing or using the Service, or a company, or other legal entity on behalf of the individual accessing or using the Service, as applicable. Under the GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation), you may be referred to as a Data Subject or as a User because you are the individual using the Service. Company (referred to as the “Company”, “We”, “We” or “We” in this Agreement) refers to Hantamkoding, jl. Kasegeran, kasegeran, cilongok, banyumas, central java indonesia 53162. For GDPR purposes, the Company is the Data Controller. Application means a software program provided by the Company which is downloaded by you on any electronic device, named Ayo Prakerin Website refers to our web pages such as Ayo Prakerin which can be accessed from application-prakerin.gitlab.io Service refers to the Application and Website and other digital properties provided by the Company. Account means a unique account created for you to access our Services or any part of our Services. Service Provider means any person or legal entity that processes data on behalf of the Company. It refers to a third party company or individual employed by the Company to facilitate the Service, to provide the Service on behalf of the Company, to perform services related to the Service or to assist the Company in analyzing how the Service is used. For GDPR purposes, Service Providers are considered Data Processors. Third Party Social Media Services refers to any website or social networking website through which the User can log in or create an account to use the Service. Facebook Fan Page is a public profile named Ayo Prakerin for Gmail specially created by the Company on the Facebook social network, accessible from https://www.facebook.com/Come PrakerinforGmail Personal Data is any information relating to an identified or identifiable individual. For GDPR purposes, Personal Data means any information relating to you such as your name, identification number, location data, online identifier, or one or more factors specific to physical, physiological, genetic, mental, economic, cultural or social factors. identity. Device means any device that can access the Service such as a computer, mobile phone or digital tablet. Usage Data refers to data that is automatically collected, either generated by the use of the Service or from the infrastructure of the Service itself (for example, the duration of page visits). Data Controller , for purposes of the GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation), refers to the Company as a legal entity which alone or together with other parties determines the purposes and means of processing Personal Data.

docs.text: The Company will retain your Personal Data only for as long as necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. We will retain and use your Personal Data to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations (for example, if we are required to retain your data to comply with applicable law), resolve disputes, and enforce our legal agreements and policies. The Company will also retain Usage Data for internal analysis purposes. Usage Data is generally stored for a shorter period of time, unless this data is used to strengthen security or to improve the functionality of Our Services, or We are legally obligated to retain this data for a longer period of time.

docs.text: If the Company is involved in a merger, acquisition or asset sale, your Personal Data may be transferred. We will provide notice before your Personal Data is transferred and is subject to a different Privacy Policy.

docs.text: In certain circumstances, the Company may be required to disclose your Personal Data if required by law or in response to a legitimate request by a public authority (eg courts or government agencies).

docs.text: The security of your Personal Data is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. docs.text: Welcome to Aplikasi Ayo Prakerin! These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of Aplikasi Ayo Prakerin's Website, located at https://aplikasi-prakerin.gitlab.io. By accessing this website we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not continue to use Aplikasi Ayo Prakerin if you do not agree to take all of the terms and conditions stated on this page. The following terminology applies to these Terms and Conditions, Privacy Statement and Disclaimer Notice and all Agreements: "Client", "You" and "Your" refers to you, the person log on this website and compliant to the Company’s terms and conditions. "The Company", "Ourselves", "We", "Our" and "Us", refers to our Company. "Party", "Parties", or "Us", refers to both the Client and ourselves. All terms refer to the offer, acceptance and consideration of payment necessary to undertake the process of our assistance to the Client in the most appropriate manner for the express purpose of meeting the Client’s needs in respect of provision of the Company’s stated services, in accordance with and subject to, prevailing law of Netherlands. Any use of the above terminology or other words in the singular, plural, capitalization and/or he/she or they, are taken as interchangeable and therefore as referring to same. Our Terms and Conditions were created with the help of the Terms & Conditions Generator . Cookies We employ the use of cookies. By accessing Aplikasi Ayo Prakerin, you agreed to use cookies in agreement with the Aplikasi Ayo Prakerin's Privacy Policy. Most interactive websites use cookies to let us retrieve the user’s details for each visit. Cookies are used by our website to enable the functionality of certain areas to make it easier for people visiting our website. Some of our affiliate/advertising partners may also use cookies. License Unless otherwise stated, Aplikasi Ayo Prakerin and/or its licensors own the intellectual property rights for all material on Aplikasi Ayo Prakerin. All intellectual property rights are reserved. You may access this from Aplikasi Ayo Prakerin for your own personal use subjected to restrictions set in these terms and conditions. You must not: Republish material from Aplikasi Ayo Prakerin Sell, rent or sub-license material from Aplikasi Ayo Prakerin Reproduce, duplicate or copy material from Aplikasi Ayo Prakerin Redistribute content from Aplikasi Ayo Prakerin This Agreement shall begin on the date hereof. Parts of this website offer an opportunity for users to post and exchange opinions and information in certain areas of the website. Aplikasi Ayo Prakerin does not filter, edit, publish or review Comments prior to their presence on the website. Comments do not reflect the views and opinions of Aplikasi Ayo Prakerin,its agents and/or affiliates. Comments reflect the views and opinions of the person who post their views and opinions. To the extent permitted by applicable laws, Aplikasi Ayo Prakerin shall not be liable for the Comments or for any liability, damages or expenses caused and/or suffered as a result of any use of and/or posting of and/or appearance of the Comments on this website. Aplikasi Ayo Prakerin reserves the right to monitor all Comments and to remove any Comments which can be considered inappropriate, offensive or causes breach of these Terms and Conditions. You warrant and represent that: You are entitled to post the Comments on our website and have all necessary licenses and consents to do so; The Comments do not invade any intellectual property right, including without limitation copyright, patent or trademark of any third party; The Comments do not contain any defamatory, libelous, offensive, indecent or otherwise unlawful material which is an invasion of privacy The Comments will not be used to solicit or promote business or custom or present commercial activities or unlawful activity. You hereby grant Aplikasi Ayo Prakerin a non-exclusive license to use, reproduce, edit and authorize others to use, reproduce and edit any of your Comments in any and all forms, formats or media. Hyperlinking to our Content The following organizations may link to our Website without prior written approval: Government agencies; Search engines; News organizations; Online directory distributors may link to our Website in the same manner as they hyperlink to the Websites of other listed businesses; and System wide Accredited Businesses except soliciting non-profit organizations, charity shopping malls, and charity fundraising groups which may not hyperlink to our Web site. These organizations may link to our home page, to publications or to other Website information so long as the link: (a) is not in any way deceptive; (b) does not falsely imply sponsorship, endorsement or approval of the linking party and its products and/or services; and (c) fits within the context of the linking party’s site. We may consider and approve other link requests from the following types of organizations: commonly-known consumer and/or business information sources; dot.com community sites; associations or other groups representing charities; online directory distributors; internet portals; accounting, law and consulting firms; and educational institutions and trade associations. We will approve link requests from these organizations if we decide that: (a) the link would not make us look unfavorably to ourselves or to our accredited businesses; (b) the organization does not have any negative records with us; (c) the benefit to us from the visibility of the hyperlink compensates the absence of Aplikasi Ayo Prakerin; and (d) the link is in the context of general resource information. These organizations may link to our home page so long as the link: (a) is not in any way deceptive; (b) does not falsely imply sponsorship, endorsement or approval of the linking party and its products or services; and (c) fits within the context of the linking party’s site. If you are one of the organizations listed in paragraph 2 above and are interested in linking to our website, you must inform us by sending an e-mail to Aplikasi Ayo Prakerin. Please include your name, your organization name, contact information as well as the URL of your site, a list of any URLs from which you intend to link to our Website, and a list of the URLs on our site to which you would like to link. Wait 2-3 weeks for a response. Approved organizations may hyperlink to our Website as follows: By use of our corporate name; or By use of the uniform resource locator being linked to; or By use of any other description of our Website being linked to that makes sense within the context and format of content on the linking party’s site. No use of Aplikasi Ayo Prakerin's logo or other artwork will be allowed for linking absent a trademark license agreement. iFrames Without prior approval and written permission, you may not create frames around our Webpages that alter in any way the visual presentation or appearance of our Website. Content Liability We shall not be hold responsible for any content that appears on your Website. You agree to protect and defend us against all claims that is rising on your Website. No link(s) should appear on any Website that may be interpreted as libelous, obscene or criminal, or which infringes, otherwise violates, or advocates the infringement or other violation of, any third party rights. Reservation of Rights We reserve the right to request that you remove all links or any particular link to our Website. You approve to immediately remove all links to our Website upon request. We also reserve the right to amen these terms and conditions and it’s linking policy at any time. By continuously linking to our Website, you agree to be bound to and follow these linking terms and conditions. Removal of links from our website If you find any link on our Website that is offensive for any reason, you are free to contact and inform us any moment. We will consider requests to remove links but we are not obligated to or so or to respond to you directly. We do not ensure that the information on this website is correct, we do not warrant its completeness or accuracy; nor do we promise to ensure that the website remains available or that the material on the website is kept up to date. Disclaimer To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, we exclude all representations, warranties and conditions relating to our website and the use of this website. Nothing in this disclaimer will: limit or exclude our or your liability for death or personal injury; limit or exclude our or your liability for fraud or fraudulent misrepresentation; limit any of our or your liabilities in any way that is not permitted under applicable law; or exclude any of our or your liabilities that may not be excluded under applicable law. The limitations and prohibitions of liability set in this Section and elsewhere in this disclaimer: (a) are subject to the preceding paragraph; and (b) govern all liabilities arising under the disclaimer, including liabilities arising in contract, in tort and for breach of statutory duty. As long as the website and the information and services on the website are provided free of charge, we will not be liable for any loss or damage of any nature.
